item.title: WATCH: Teacher turns tragedy into good deeds with $20 kindness challenge
item.description: Kristina Ulmer’s specific assignment started in 2018 to honor the memory of her sister, Katie Amodei, who passed away in 2014.

item.title: Trump administration live updates: Judge blocks Trump's military transgender ban
item.description: A federal judge has blocked the Trump administration from enforcing a ban on transgender service members.

item.title: WATCH: Teen paddleboarders rescued after 16-hour ordeal
item.description: Three fishermen found the girls, both 16, after a tide pushed them 14 miles off course in Florida’s Gulf Coast.

item.title: WATCH: Dolphins greet NASA astronauts after splash down
item.description: A pod of dolphins circled the NASA astronauts' capsule after it successfully splashed down off the coast of Florida.

item.title: Dispute between parents, Ohio school district over gender pronouns goes before judges
item.description: The 6th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in Cincinnati is hearing arguments in a lawsuit pitting a suburban Ohio school district’s policy on preferred pr...
